description: The Canadian Space Agency wants to retain electrical maintenance and repair services for The David Florida Laboratory (DFL) in Ottawa, on an as and required basis, for a variety of renovations, maintenances, repairs and retrofits.
full_summary:
## Procurement Information

The Canadian Space Agency invites bid submissions for the provision of Electrical Maintenance and Repair Services at the David Florida Laboratory (DFL) in Ottawa. This requirement is to be fulfilled on an as-and-when-required basis for various renovations, maintenance, repairs, and retrofits.

### Key Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: PW-23-01026122
* **Solicitation Number**: 9F023-20220316
* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-16
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-03T14:00:00
* **Contract Period**: From April 1, 2023, to September 30, 2024, with optional one-year extensions for a maximum of eighteen months.

### Procurement Requirements

* The chosen bidder will be required to provide electrical maintenance and repair services for the David Florida Laboratory, located at 3701 Carling Avenue, Ottawa, Ontario.
* Bidders must possess a Class A Electrical Contractor License.
* The bidder must comply with all relevant laws, regulations, and standards, including those related to health, safety, and security.
* The Canadian Space Agency will conduct a site visit on February 23, 2023, for all interested bidders.

### Mandatory Documents

To participate in the bidding process, interested parties must submit their bid documents in accordance with the requirements outlined in the request for proposal.

### Mandatory Documents

* The Request for Proposal (RFP) document is available on Canada Buys.
* [Refer to attachment] The full RFP document and supporting materials are available on the Canada Buys website.

### Notice of Intent

If your bid is successful, the notice will be published on the Canada Buys website.

### Contrclaimed Documents and Contact Info

Contact Denise Chessie for more information. 
* Email: [denise.chessie@asc-csa.gc.ca](mailto:denise.chessie@asc-csa.gc.ca)
* Phone: (none provided)
* Fax: (none provided)

### Expressions of Interest

To bid on this procurement opportunity, firms must submit their request to the Canadian Space Agency. Bidding firms must meet all the requirements outlined in this notice, including, but not limited to, experience, qualifications, and insurance requirements.

### Deadline

Submissions must be received by the deadline listed above. Late bids will not be accepted.

### Contacts

Denise Chessie: retractions in progress.
